publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1629 Bill Aitken on behalf of the Justice Committee: Report on Inquiry into the Effective Use of Police Resources—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Justice Committee’s 4th Report, 2008 (Session 3): Report on Inquiry into the Effective Use of Police Resources (SP Paper 50).

S3M-1629 Bill Aitken on behalf of the Justice Committee: Report on Inquiry into the Effective Use of Police Resources—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Justice Committee’s 4th Report, 2008 (Session 3): Report on Inquiry into the Effective Use of Police Resources (SP Paper 50).

S3M-1629 Bill Aitken on behalf of the Justice Committee: Report on Inquiry into the Effective Use of Police Resources—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Justice Committee’s 4th Report, 2008 (Session 3): Report on Inquiry into the Effective Use of Police Resources (SP Paper 50). Supported by: Bill Butler*
